data.message: Hey Slim, I know you probably don't respond to many people but I was hoping mabye I could be one of them. I am a struggling alcoholic & addict and it all started through a traumatic relationship. Your Recovey album made me have faith again and every morning I would put in my ear plugs and jog to that cd. I still listen to it everyday bc it gives me encouragement. I understand if your too bust to respond, but I just wanted to give you that memo.

replies.message: Eminem isn't even the person who uses this fan page it's his PR ppl who work for him maybe find his address on Google and write him a letter u can be the real life STAN lol he has way more important things to do other than to come on Facebook and post pictures

well thanks a lot fucker!!! Your asshole comment is yours and yours alone! I know he is too busy to care about a Facebook account but I know he cares about his fucking fans! So why don't you quit being a smart ass....
